title: Update Client Report with Written Insights
description: An account manager needs to add a written summary and key insights to an automated weekly performance report before sending it to the client.

tasks.description: Open the auto-generated weekly performance report.
Analyze the key metrics and trends in the report.
Write a concise executive summary (2-3 sentences) highlighting the main results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds a clear summary to the top of the report.

tasks.description: Add 2-3 bullet points under 'Key Insights & Next Steps' explaining the 'why' behind the numbers and recommending actions for the upcoming week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds actionable insights to the report.
